title: Deva Curl Set it Free 6 oz.
description: Put an end to frizz with this 24-48 hour moisture lock. Adds shine and defines curls with a long lasting hold. Scented with zesty lemon-lime. Not tested on animals. Made in USA.

title: DevaCurl B'Leave-In curl Boost and Volumizer 6 oz
description: Infused with specially selected botanicals and enriching proteins. B'Leave-In delivers added moisture, vitality and brilliance to your precious locks. Ideal for all hair types, B'Leave-In maintains luster, silkiness and manageability.

title: Moroccanoil by Moroccanoil Moroccanoil Luminous Hairspray Aero for Unisex, 10 Ounce
description: * Won't leave hair looking brittle or dried out * Maintains shape and style while adding a burst of shine! * Leaves hair manageable, no sticky residue * Holds your do all day long
